title: Gradle builds are now failing
body:
### Describe the bug

Generated a Quarkus app on code.quarkus.io (using Gradle) and ran:

`./gradlew build`

### Expected behavior

Build should be ok

### Actual behavior

Missing dependencies:


```
$ ./gradlew build
Starting a Gradle Daemon, 2 incompatible Daemons could not be reused, use --status for details

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
A problem occurred configuring root project 'code-with-quarkus'.
> Could not resolve all artifacts for configuration ':classpath'.
   > Could not find quarkus-gradle-plugins:gradle-model:2.5.0.CR1.
     Searched in the following locations:
       - file:/C:/Users/JeffMAURY/.m2/repository/quarkus-gradle-plugins/gradle-model/2.5.0.CR1/gradle-model-2.5.0.CR1.pom
       - https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/quarkus-gradle-plugins/gradle-model/2.5.0.CR1/gradle-model-2.5.0.CR1.pom
       - https://plugins.gradle.org/m2/quarkus-gradle-plugins/gradle-model/2.5.0.CR1/gradle-model-2.5.0.CR1.pom
     Required by:
         project : > io.quarkus:io.quarkus.gradle.plugin:2.5.0.CR1 > io.quarkus:gradle-application-plugin:2.5.0.CR1

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

BUILD FAILED in 44s
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
